tool_description: The most comprehensive UK student loan repayment calculator
name: Student Loan Calculator
title: Student Loan Calculator

api_list.name: GraphQL
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://student-loan-calculator.p.rapidapi.com/graphql"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "student-loan-calculator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://student-loan-calculator.p.rapidapi.com/graphql"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())
